name: Buildscape Beta!
description:
Buildscape -    𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐛𝐨𝐱 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞

Buildscape is the Ultimate Sandbox Experience (soon to be) with many features that enhance the foundations that Tiny Town VR laid before us. A casual game about building a fully interchangeable world on your computer, allowing the player to create your own story with buildings and figures in an almost infinite world.  

With a growing list of assets at your fingertips, we hope to achieve the  𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐛𝐨𝐱 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 without the need for an economic system.

  • Intuitive Camera Controls
  • Easy Item Placement (Drag and Drop)
  • Simple UI Design
  • Hundreds of assets
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Grid Snapping
  • Toggleable Grid Sizes
  • And MORE!!

𝗔 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀

Feel free to join our discord if you're interested in the game and future projects and how it's developing!

https://discord.gg/fCRMfgPCc9

Bugs and missing features are to be expected in the current state of play. 

The game uses Mouse & Keyboard (no gamepad support)

From the team, we hope that you enjoy playing buildscape <3
